goals.active: Execute the Vigil's plan to defend the Durmand Priory.
goals.complete: For my first official act as a Vigil recruit, I joined Thurkill in defending the Durmand Priory and Ogden Stonehealer from Vyacheslav's Sonic Vaporizer. We crushed the dredge and destroyed their weapon. Afterward, I said good-bye to Eir, and Thurkill sent me to Lion's Arch to meet my new Vigil partner.
